content: **this is a pay what you want pattern use the code feeling50 for 50% off the original price or use the code feeling100 for a free copy if you download for free i d love it if you gave this pattern a ❤️ thank you for your support the *mixed feelings coaster* is a quick beginner-friendly make that s simple pretty and a little bit playful it works up fast great for a relaxed evening project a last-minute gift or using up those leftover yarn scraps the mix of light lacy stitches and fun bobbles gives it a unique texture and the trendy edging pulls everything together without making the pattern complicated it s easy to customize with colors you love and the finished coaster adds a sweet touch of handmade style to any space this pattern uses dk-weight yarn paired with a 4 5 mm hook for coasters i recommend sticking with synthetic or plant-based fibers they re sturdy easy to clean and hold up well with everyday use the design is worked in the round and combines a handful of simple stitches bobbles double_crochet single_crochet and chains to create its fun texture and look a neat little picot border finishes things off with a decorative touch the coaster is written in one standard size that works well for most cups and mugs but you can easily tweak it try adjusting your hook size switching to a different yarn weight or adding an extra round or two if you want a slightly larger piece gauge isn t critical here so feel free to experiment this is a beginner-friendly project built around basic stitches and easy techniques to make it even more accessible the pattern includes written instructions for the bobble stitch a photo tutorial located at the end of the pattern and links to video demos for any special steps the pattern is 19 pages long but only two pages are actually crochet instructions the others are pattern information and the photo tutorial thank you for choosing my pattern i hope you enjoyed it if you enjoyed this pattern you may be interested in some of my other patterns you can check them out here 1 you may sell as many of the finished items as you wish but if you share on social media please give me credit @elly donner on ravelry and link the pattern to its source if you have any questions or need pattern support please contact me here 2 @stopitharry on ravelry i appreciate your support thank you to my amazing testers maylina /people/maylina qtpieknitter /people/qtpieknitter divavonpurl /people/divavonpurl signergirl1 /people/signergirl1 lnwilson96 /people/lnwilson96 nitaknits /people/nitaknits anjaliellis /people/anjaliellis & beetheknitter /people/beetheknitter this pattern wouldn t have been possible without your help 1 https //www ravelry com/designers/elly-donner 2 https //www ravelry com/people/stopitharry
